greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-2)^k * binomial(n,k)^3.
comment: Diagonal of the rational function 1 / (1 + y + z + x*y + y*z - 2*z*x - x*y*z).
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[(-2)^k * Binomial[n, k]^3, {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 23, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 11 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 10 2020
